commit message: reworked the code to simplify codepath for file downloads
Refactoring inner classes out to module level to ease testing.
More refactoring to inner classes to module level classes.

Renamed SmartFSAbstractTileLoader to SmartFSTileLoader as it's not
actually an abstract class.
added test fixtures for tile load tests
Renamed httpResponse to httpStatusCode()
cleanup
do not change map type if there is no network connection
lowres and highres map tiles should use the same cache

Pulled SmartFSTileLoader to the module level to make testing easier.
Moved MockHttpUtil into the test branch of the source from the actual application code.
Added a basic testcase that runs the TileDownloaderDelegate::downloadTile method to completion
show MLS coverage overlay when offline

Blargh.  Slow.
Updated TileDownloaderDelegateTest so that tile fixture data is properly loaded from disk.
replaced real downloading with mock downloads

added tests for 3 basic cases:

* simple HTTP200 download
* HTTP 304 conditional GET with existing ondisk cache
* HTTP 304 conditional GET with corrupt on disk cache

added 2 tests for network failure.
* Tiles are returned if ondisk tiles already exist
* NULL is returned if no ondisk tile already exists
backed out unittest for the the homescreen widget
